channel.title: Comments on: MAKE UP FOR EVER HD Foundation

item.title: By: Sarah Cosper
item.dc:creator: Sarah Cosper
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/makeup-forever-hd-foundation/#comment-277">Tisha F.</a>.
Oooh! Mom's gonna like that one! Haha!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Tisha F..

Oooh! Mom’s gonna like that one! Haha!

item.title: By: Suzi
item.dc:creator: Suzi
item.description: Pink Porcelain is my jam! And literally the only foundation I've ever found that matches my skin perfectly. It took almost two hours at Sephora to find it, but it was so worth it!
item.content:encoded: Pink Porcelain is my jam! And literally the only foundation I’ve ever found that matches my skin perfectly. It took almost two hours at Sephora to find it, but it was so worth it!

item.title: By: Tisha F.
item.dc:creator: Tisha F.
item.description: Your parents are timeless. Thank pictures looks like it could have been taken yesterday.
item.content:encoded: Your parents are timeless. Thank pictures looks like it could have been taken yesterday.
